entry.title: Andriamahay11master/Voxa: Voxa is a real-time messaging web application built with React and Node.js. It allows users to chat instantly using WebSockets, offering a fast and responsive interface similar to WhatsApp or Viber. Voxa is designed to be lightweight, modern, and mobile-friendly, perfect for staying connected
entry.content: Voxa is a real-time messaging web application built with React and Node.js. It allows users to chat instantly using WebSockets, offering a fast and responsive interface similar to WhatsApp or Viber. Voxa is designed to be lightweight, modern, and mobile-friendly, perfect for staying connected
